columns.timestamp: Synthetic timestamp for when the utterance was recorded (ISO-8601).
columns.region: High-level region (Kigali, Northern, Western, Eastern, Southern).
columns.language: Language label: rw, en, or mixed.
columns.utterance_text: ASR transcript of the user utterance (contains realistic noise and code-switching).
columns.intent: Target intent label (contains ~3% label noise for realism).

notes: This is a synthetic dataset intended for take-home assessments; it is not based on real citizen data.
Utterances include code-switching (Kinyarwanda/English/French terms), slang, and ASR-like noise.
Class distribution is mildly imbalanced to reflect real traffic patterns.
Label noise (~3%) is included to encourage robust evaluation and error analysis.
